Command.Name: Adjusters
Command.Title: Install a Custom Gameconfig, Heap & Packfile Limit Adjuster.
Command.Description:
**Custom Gameconfig**
Using OpenIV, drag and drop the gameconfig.xml into `GTAV/mods/update/update.rpf/common/data`.

**Heap Adjuster**
Drag the Heapadjuster.asi and HeapAdjuster.ini into your main directory.

**Packfile Limit Adjuster**
Drag the PackfileLimitAdjuster.asi and PackfileLimitAdjuster.ini into your main directory.
